clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Acute Bronchodilator Effect of CHF1535 NEXThaler
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II, Multicentre, Double-blind, Randomised, 5-way Crossover Study to Test the Non-inferiority of the Acute Bronchodilator Effect of CHF 1535 200/6 µg NEXThaler Versus CHF 1535 100/6 µg NEXThaler in Partially Controlled and Uncontrolled Adult Asthmatic Patients.

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to demonstrate the non-inferiority in terms of acute bronchodilator effect between a single dose of CHF 1535 NEXThaler 200/6 µg and a single dose of CHF 1535 NEXThaler 100/6 µg at two dose levels in partially controlled and uncontrolled asthmatic patients.

primary_outcome.description: FEV1= Forced expiratory volume in the first second of expiration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 5 to 14 weeks
